{{About|current governors of Argentine provinces|a historical list about the country itself|List of heads of state of Argentina}} The '''Governors''' are the Executive authorities of each [[Provinces of Argentina|Argentine Province]]. The [[Buenos Aires|Autonomous City of Buenos Aires]] has instead a '''[[List of mayors and chiefs of government of Buenos Aires|Chief of Government]]''', informally referred to as Mayor ({{lang-es|intendente}}, [[Intendant#Argentina|Intendant]]). {| class = "wikitable" !
